resources.string:
The MADCAP (Mobile Application Data CAPture) app collects data for research on mobile device security. Please visit https://www.fc-md.umd.edu/madcap for more information.

The app periodically uploads data to a remote server only when you are connected to a WiFi network.

You may turn data collection on or off at any time using the toggle switch below.

This application uses the Funf Open Sensing Framework licensed under the GNU Lesser GPL.\n\n This application was developed by the Fraunhofer CESE. For any questions, email llayman@cese.fraunhofer.org.
